#include "commo.h"
#include "../rcc/graph.h"
#include "../rcc/graph_marshaler.h"
#include "../command.h"
#include "../procedure.h"
#include "../command_marshaler.h"
#include "raft_rpc.h"
#include "macros.h"

namespace janus {

RaftCommo::RaftCommo(PollMgr* poll) : Communicator(poll) {
}

shared_ptr<IntEvent> RaftCommo::SendRequestVote(parid_t par_id,
                                siteid_t site_id,
                                siteid_t my_id,
                                uint64_t leader_term, /*Current Term of candidate*/
                                uint64_t candidate_last_log_index, /*last Log Index of candidtae*/
                                uint64_t candidate_last_log_term,
                                uint64_t* ret1,
                                bool_t* vote_granted) {

   auto ev = rrr::Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];

  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;


      fuattr.callback = [site_id, ret1, vote_granted,ev](Future* fu) {
        /* this is a handler that will be invoked when the RPC returns */

        /* retrieve RPC return values in order */
        fu->get_reply() >> *ret1;
        fu->get_reply() >> *vote_granted;
        if(ev->status_<=Event::WAIT){
          ev->Set(1);
        }
        /*EventStatus { INIT = 0, WAIT = 1, READY = 2,
            DONE = 3, TIMEOUT = 4};*/
        /* process the RPC response here */
      };
      /* Always use Call_Async(proxy, RPC name, RPC args..., fuattr)
      * to asynchronously invoke RPCs */

      Call_Async(proxy, RequestVote, my_id , leader_term, candidate_last_log_index,candidate_last_log_term, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}

shared_ptr<IntEvent> RaftCommo::SendEmptyAppendEntries(parid_t par_id,
                                  siteid_t site_id,
                                  siteid_t leaderId,
                                  uint64_t leaderTerm,
                                  int64_t l_commitIndex,
                                  bool_t *followerAppendOK,
                                  uint64_t *followerTerm,
                                  uint64_t *followerIndex) {
  /*
   * More example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
   auto ev = rrr::Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [followerAppendOK,followerTerm,followerIndex,ev](Future* fu) {

        fu->get_reply() >> *followerAppendOK;
        fu->get_reply() >> *followerTerm;
        fu->get_reply() >> *followerIndex;
        if(ev->status_<=Event::WAIT){
          ev->Set(1);
        }
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */

      Call_Async(proxy, EmptyAppendEntries,leaderId,
                                      leaderTerm, l_commitIndex,
                                      fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}
shared_ptr<IntEvent> RaftCommo::SendAppendEntries(parid_t par_id,
                                       siteid_t site_id,
                                       siteid_t leaderId,
                                       uint64_t leaderTerm,
                                       int64_t prevLogIndex,
                                       int64_t prevLogTerm,
                                       int64_t leaderCommit,
                                       const vector<shared_ptr<Marshallable>>& cmds,
                                       const  vector<uint64_t>& cmd_terms,
                                       bool_t* followerAppendOK,
                                       uint64_t* followerTerm){


        auto ev = rrr::Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
        auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
        for (auto& p : proxies) {
          if (p.first == site_id) {
            RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
            FutureAttr fuattr;


            fuattr.callback = [followerAppendOK,followerTerm,ev](Future* fu) {
              fu->get_reply() >> *followerAppendOK;
              fu->get_reply() >> *followerTerm;
              if(ev->status_<=Event::WAIT){
                ev->Set(1);
              }
            };
            vector<MarshallDeputy> mds;

            for(int i=0;i<cmds.size();i++){
              mds.push_back(MarshallDeputy(cmds[i]));
            }
            //  MarshallDeputy md(cmd);                          /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
          Call_Async(proxy, AppendEntries,  leaderId, leaderTerm,
                                                      prevLogIndex,
                                                      prevLogTerm,
                                                      leaderCommit,
                                                      mds,
                                                      cmd_terms,
                                                      fuattr)

          }
        }
        return ev;

    }

    shared_ptr<IntEvent> RaftCommo::SendEmptyAppendEntries2(parid_t par_id,
                                           siteid_t site_id,
                                           siteid_t leaderId,
                                           uint64_t leaderTerm,
                                           uint64_t prevLogIndex,
                                           uint64_t prevLogTerm,
                                           uint64_t leaderCommit,
                                           bool_t* followerAppendOK,
                                           uint64_t* followerTerm){


            auto ev = rrr::Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
            auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
            for (auto& p : proxies) {
              if (p.first == site_id) {
                RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
                FutureAttr fuattr;
                fuattr.callback = [followerAppendOK,followerTerm,ev](Future* fu) {
                  fu->get_reply() >> *followerAppendOK;
                  fu->get_reply() >> *followerTerm;
                  if(ev->status_<=Event::WAIT){
                    ev->Set(1);
                  }
                };

                //  MarshallDeputy md(cmd);                          /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
              Call_Async(proxy, EmptyAppendEntries2,  leaderId, leaderTerm,
                                                          prevLogIndex,
                                                          prevLogTerm,
                                                          leaderCommit,
                                                          fuattr)

              }
            }
            return ev;

        }




shared_ptr<IntEvent>
RaftCommo::SendString(parid_t par_id, siteid_t site_id, const string& msg, string* res) {

  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [res,ev](Future* fu) {
        fu->get_reply() >> *res;
        ev->Set(1);
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      Call_Async(proxy, HelloRpc, msg, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}


} // namespace janus
